overview: The story tells the story of the Monkey King who thought he could return the love debt of the spider spirit and the reunion of the spider spirit, but was caught in the huge plot of his enemy, the six-eared macaque. What makes Wukong unable to free himself is that the descendants of the king of the king of the sharks, the shark demoness, who had been destroyed by Wukong, even took advantage of the six-eared macaque in the shark country to retaliate against Wukong, and the six-eared macaque secretly teamed up to plan a series of shocking plots to start a series of revenge against Wukong.
title: Journey to the West: The Legend of the Mermaid
